title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Skills: Professional Science Teaching Attitudes (STA) for Preservice Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Preservice science teachers can reduce anxiety during science instruction by over 30% and improve self-efficacy
Preservice science teachers can decrease dependency on resources/methods/time and demonstrate self-directed lesson design capabilities
Preservice science teachers can form behavioral intentions to incorporate science-related activities into lessons over 80% of the time

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
